entry.title: farm
entry.content: We went to the countryside to plant peanuts today. The breeze was cool and refreshing, but I just stood by and watched as they worked the fields. My dad was using a needle to inject liquid into a tree, causing it to die. We bought two kilograms of peanuts, and after planting, only a few taels remained. They were planted on a slope, and my grandmother hoed the ground, her face dripping with sweat.here is the farm we worked on.
